name: get_a_random_quote_tagged_by_a_specific_tag
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool self_help_quotes.
Tool description: Hand-picked quotes from the best self-help books around. Get a random quote every day, filter by tags, books, and more...
API description: Fetch a random quote tagged with a specific tag from the Self-Help Quotes API.

tag.description: The specific tag to filter quotes.
